title: Hunting Mariah
description: An insane killer, obsessed with blood and death, seeks revenge with those he perceives wronged him. He is now on the loose. His next victim may be Mariah. During his rampages he writes macabre poems for his victims.Mariah has lost her memory. Will she remember what has transpired in her past? Can Mariah escape the deadly killer's grasp? Will she finally be safe? Will the killer be apprehended?
author: J.E. Spina
